mapper.insert: insert into JOB_B (ID, SHOWNAME, JOBNAME, GROUPID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CRON, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CLASSORBEAN, USEMETHOD, NEXTTIME, GROUPNAME, STARTTIME, RUNCOUNT ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classorbean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usemethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nexttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: update JOB_B set SHOWNAME = #{showname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOBNAME = #{jobname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRON = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYTIME = #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASSORBEAN = #{classorbean,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USEMETHOD = #{usemethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXTTIME = #{nexttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPNAME = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUNCOUNT = #{runcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SHOWNAME, JOBNAME, GROUPID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CRON, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CLASSORBEAN, USEMETHOD, NEXTTIME, GROUPNAME, STARTTIME, RUNCOUNT from JOB_B where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SHOWNAME, JOBNAME, GROUPID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CRON, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CLASSORBEAN, USEMETHOD, NEXTTIME, GROUPNAME, STARTTIME, RUNCOUNT from JOB_B where 1=1 ${_parameter}

select ID, SHOWNAME, JOBNAME, GROUPID, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CRON, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, CLASSORBEAN, USEMETHOD, NEXTTIME, GROUPNAME, STARTTIME, RUNCOUNT from JOB_B where JOBNAME = #{0} and GROUPID = #{1}
